WorkItem.ClosedComment: We agree :) You'll see "Compiling files..." / "Outputs generated" messages in the status bar in the next release.
WorkItem.Description:
It's great that VisualStudio auto-compiles, but it's not clear when this is happening.
Some sort of visual cue, e.g. in the status bar, that TS is busy compiling would be very useful.

Something I'm often wondering to myself is "Are there are actually no errors in my file, or is the compiling just not finished?"
